SEARCH
Package models

Class MedicalCertificate

java.lang.Object
models.MedicalCertificate
public class MedicalCertificate extends Object
Represents a medical certificate issued to a patient, containing details such as the reason, duration, issue date, and approval status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs a MedicalCertificate object with the specified patient details, reason, and duration.
    MedicalCertificate(String patientId, String patientName, String reason, String date, int day, String status, String outcome)
    Another Constructor that constructs a MedicalCertificate with detailed parameters for existing records.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalCertificate

      public MedicalCertificate(String patientId, String patientName, String reason, int duration)
      Constructs a MedicalCertificate object with the specified patient details, reason, and duration. The issue date is set to the current date, the status is set to "Pending," and the approver is set to "N/A."
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      patientName - the name of the patient
      reason - the reason for the medical certificate
      duration - the duration in days for which the certificate is valid

    • MedicalCertificate

      public MedicalCertificate(String patientId, String patientName, String reason, String date, int day, String status, String outcome)
      Another Constructor that constructs a MedicalCertificate with detailed parameters for existing records.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      patientName - the name of the patient
      reason - the reason for the medical certificate
      date - the issue date of the certificate as a string
      day - the duration in days for which the certificate is valid
      status - the status of the certificate (e.g., Pending, Approved, Rejected)
      outcome - the name of the doctor who approved or rejected the certificate
